<img src="/.github/screenshots/dwm.png" width="100%" />

# Programs/applications used
- dwm (window manager)
- st (terminal)
- dmenu (run launcher)
- slock (screen lock)
- dunst (notification daemon)
- mpd (music daemon)
- ncmpcpp (ncurses frontend for mpd/mpc)
- ranger (file manager)
- picom (compositor)

Feel free to copy whatever you want and/or need...
